Finally, use another piece of chiyogami paper to create the obi and obijime, and attach them to the body as well.

pred_summary: To update the BIOS on your computer, you can check the manufacturer's website for a BIOS update using the exact model of your computer. You can download the executable for your computer model and save it to your desktop. Before rebooting your computer, make sure you follow any instructions provided by the utility.

gt_summary: Get a referral for a specialist eye clinic from your optometrist. Learn the possible risks of laser eye surgery. Allow the eye surgeon to perform laser eye surgery. Recover
pred_summary: Laser eye surgery is a procedure that uses a laser to reshape the cornea of your eye to correct astigmatism. The cost of the surgery can range from $300 to $4,000 per eye and may not be covered by insurance. Most people can drive and return to work 1-2 days after surgery, but it may take several weeks for issues like dry eyes, double vision, and glare to clear up completely.

gt_summary: Consume less than the recommended amounts of fiber daily. Minimize fiber in meals and snacks. Limit insoluble fiber. Minimize fiber-fortified foods. Discontinue fiber supplements. Write up a meal plan.
pred_summary: The recommended daily fiber intake varies by gender, with women needing 25 grams and men needing 38 grams. If you are experiencing discomfort or health issues due to high fiber intake, you may need to reduce your fiber intake. A meal plan can help you track your daily fiber intake and make substitutions to limit fiber if necessary.

gt_summary: Apply a pre-stain conditioner and let it set up for 1 to 5 minutes. Apply water stain with a cloth, synthetic bristle brush, paint pad or foam brush, following the grain of the wood. Apply second coat of stain, if needed, once the 1st coat has set up, usually 2 hours. Wait at least 3 hours before applying a sealer coat if desired.
pred_summary: Stain conditioner is necessary when using a water-based stain on wood. It helps the stain penetrate the wood evenly and can be applied with a clean cloth after wiping off excess. The conditioner should be allowed to penetrate the wood for no more than 3 minutes before wiping off excess.

gt_summary: Click the Apple menu and select "System Preferences". Click the "Displays" option. Select your external display. Set the "Rotation" menu to the option you want in the "Display" tab. Check that mirroring is not enabled. Attempt to rotate a built-in monitor (OS 10.9 and below).
pred_summary: To rotate an external display on a Mac, you can only rotate the external display, and it must support rotations. In older versions of OS X, you can try forcing a built-in display to rotate by opening a special version of the Displays menu, but this is not recommended in newer versions of OS X. If you want to rotate an internal display, such as on a MacBook or iMac, you will need to use a different method.

gt_summary: Go to www.gs1-us.org and click “Apply Now. Fill out the application. Pay the required fees. Be wary of purchasing codes through a secondary market.
pred_summary: You can apply for a UPC code through GS1, a non-profit organization, by logging onto their website and completing an application. The application will require personal information and business projections, and there will be fees associated with obtaining the code. There are also internet-based companies that sell UPC codes at a lower price, but these codes will not include your company's Company Prefix and may not be suitable for selling products through major retailers.

gt_summary: Open Audio Archive. Click the search bar. Search for music. Select a song to download. Scroll down to the "DOWNLOAD OPTIONS" heading. Click the VBR MP3 option.
pred_summary: To download music from the Internet Archive, go to the website and enter the name of a song or artist in the search bar. From the song's page, click the "DOWNLOAD OPTIONS" link to initiate the download of the MP3 file. The file will begin downloading to your computer, and you may need to confirm the download or select a save location.

gt_summary: Be a survivor. Change your behaviors if you are lonely. Watch out for the stereotypes. Don’t give in to peer pressure. Talk to the school counselor. Talk to your parents. Talk to a medical professional.
pred_summary: The text suggests that being a loner in high school can have both positive and negative consequences. While it may provide time for introspection and personal growth, it can also lead to social isolation and negative stereotypes. It is important for loners to be aware of these potential outcomes and to seek help if they are unhappy or struggling with negative emotions.

gt_summary: Drink barley or rice water. Take some probiotic supplements. Take some apple cider vinegar. Use herbs. Soothe your stomach with honey and ginger.
pred_summary: Probiotics, apple cider vinegar, basil, cumin, thyme, rosemary, coriander, sage, spearmint, and fennel are some of the home remedies that can help alleviate the symptoms of food poisoning. Ginger and honey tea can also help to reduce stomach pain and indigestion. It is important to consult a doctor before taking any of these remedies, especially if you have a weak immune system.

gt_summary: Go for flats or flat sandals. Dress things up with a pair of heels. Go casual and chic with a wedge heel.
pred_summary: Flat sandals or basic flats are perfect for a casual summer look with high-waisted shorts. Sandals or flats made of leather can add a dressier look. For a night out, silk high-waisted shorts can be paired with heels for a bold look.

gt_summary: Assemble your ingredients. Cover the pan and microwave the fish. Finish microwaving the fish and check to see if it's done.
pred_summary: The recipe calls for two skinless fish fillets, which are placed in a shallow baking dish filled with whole milk and salt. After microwaving for 3 minutes, the fish is removed and allowed to rest before being microwaved again for another minute. The fish is checked to see if it is finished, and if not, it is microwaved for another 30 seconds.

gt_summary: Allow the jeans to soak for 30 minutes to an hour. Hang your jeans up to dry overnight.
pred_summary: Jeans can be cleaned using a simple soap and water mixture. Swirl the jeans around in the mixture until suds form, then soak them for up to an hour before hanging them up to dry. After drying, the jeans may be stiff, so wear them for 20-30 minutes to loosen them up.

gt_summary: Type in "boolprop testingcheatsenabled true" while in the neighborhood screen (type it in without the quotations). SHIFT+CLICK on the the mailbox of the desired family. Go to spawn 'NPC. When the witch spawns, shift-click her and press "MAKE SELECTABLE" then click your Sim (not shift-click) and go to 'cast spell.
pred_summary: A Sim can become a witch/warlock by using the "Grand Witch/Warlock" aspiration and clicking on the "Magus Mutatio" option. This will give the Sim the witch/warlock trait and allow them to use magic. The specific alignment of the witch/warlock (good, evil, or neutral) will depend on the player's choice.

gt_summary: Find small, dark glass bottles to store your oil. Choose an essential oil for a top note. Decide on a middle note. Select a base note. Pick a carrier oil. Check for allergic reactions
pred_summary: To make a simple body oil with essential oils, choose a top note, middle note, and base note that you want to combine. Dilute each essential oil with a carrier oil before applying it to your skin, and conduct a patch test before using it. Store your oils in dark glass bottles with tight caps or corks to preserve them.

gt_summary: Open Google Drive. Click NEW. Select an upload option. Select your file(s) or folder. Click Open. Wait for the file(s) or folder to upload. Organize your files.
pred_summary: You can upload files to Google Drive by going to the Google Drive webpage, logging into your Google Account, and clicking the File upload or Folder upload option. Once you select the files or folder you want to upload, they will be uploaded to Google Drive and can be accessed from any internet-connected device. After the files have been uploaded, you can organize them by moving them into folders or removing unnecessary files by right-clicking and removing them.

gt_summary: Discuss the importance of minimalism as a family. Identify the areas of your home that could be minimized. Assess your personal possessions. Examine your family’s daily schedule.
pred_summary: Minimalism is a lifestyle change that can benefit families by saving money, simplifying daily routines, and creating more space for relaxation and enjoyment. Families can start by discussing the importance of minimalism together, identifying areas in their home that could use a minimalist treatment, and creating a list of personal possessions they are willing to give away or sell. By reducing the amount of time spent on draining activities and simplifying their schedules, families can enjoy more quality time together and improve their overall well-being.

gt_summary: Think through your decisions so you don’t act impulsively. Work on controlling your anger or frustration so you don’t act out. Take responsibility for your actions if you make a mistake. Stay positive and optimistic to help you through hard times. Keep an open mind so you don’t judge others. Act humble so you don’t seem jealous of other people.
pred_summary: Whenever you're given multiple choices, take a moment to consider each option's pros and cons and think about what you want to achieve. Ask someone you trust for advice if you're unsure, and be firm in your decisions so you don't fall victim to peer pressure. When you're angry or frustrated, take a few deep breaths to calm down before addressing the situation.

gt_summary: Head over to the elevator and take it to the 3rd floor. Exit the elevator.
pred_summary: Alessa is seen praying at an altar in a ghostly image after obtaining the Hagith key. The altar holds two paintings that are the clue to unlocking the doors on either side of the corridor. Solving the puzzle will allow you to progress through the game.

gt_summary: Have the blind person hold your arm just above the elbow. Make sure the blind person is a half step to a step behind you. Have the blind person walk behind you in narrow spaces. Let the blind person know if you need to switch sides.
pred_summary: Blind people should hold the back of your hand to help them figure out where your arm is, and then hold your arm just above the elbow. You should keep a pace you are both comfortable with and periodically ask the blind person if they want to move faster or slower. Let the blind person know about obstacles and adjust how you walk when encountering narrow spaces.

gt_summary: Do a steam-clean process with vinegar. Pour vinegar and baking soda on a sponge and clean the microwave. Use a scrub brush.
pred_summary: Microwaves can get burnt popcorn smell out of their interiors by using equal parts water and white vinegar in a bowl in the microwave for 3 minutes, followed by a towel or cloth wipe down. For more stubborn smells, a sponge or scrub brush with a vinegar and baking soda mixture can be used. These methods will leave a vinegary scent behind that will dissipate after a couple of days.

gt_summary: Learn what soldering is. Use solder to bind things. Use a soldering iron to heat the solder. Use other equipment to assist in soldering. Turn on the lights. Prepare adequate ventilation. Don't solder for too long in one sitting.
pred_summary: Soldering is the process of melting a metal onto other metal components to bind them together. It is different from welding as it uses a softer metal with a lower melting point to connect components, making it useful for more delicate applications. Soldering involves heating a metal alloy, called solder, until it melts and bonds with the other components, and it can be used to fill in gaps or hold pieces in place.

gt_summary: Choose a leg and gently pull it out. Secure one of his/her nails. Pick up the nail clippers with your other hand. Identify the quick in the nail. Trim the nail. Proceed with trimming the rest of your guinea pig's nails. Put your guinea pig back in his/her cage and tidy up the nail trimmings.
pred_summary: Guinea pigs will wiggle when you trim their nails, so be patient and don't squeeze too tightly. Use styptic powder or cornstarch to stop any bleeding if you cut the quick. Trim one nail at a time and give your guinea pig a treat after each nail to provide positive reinforcement.

gt_summary: Change pillowcases and bedding once per week. Use linen spray. Machine wash pillows at least twice per year. Go to bed with a clean face and hair.
pred_summary: Pillows should be washed every 3-6 months, depending on body composition and sleep habits. Changing pillowcases and bedding at least once a week can help keep your pillows clean and fresh. Regularly using linen spray can help prevent mold and mildew buildup and promote relaxation.

gt_summary: Consider the body. Examine coloration. Examine tail feathers. Check the wings.
pred_summary: Male African Greys tend to be slightly larger than females, with rounder heads and shorter necks. Females have longer necks and larger heads. Ventral feathers are another way to tell the difference, with males having solid red feathers and females having edged feathers.

gt_summary: Choose a small garbage sized plastic bag. Gather the rest of the supplies. Find an open area.
pred_summary: To make a plastic poncho for your dog, you will need a garbage bag, scissors, and a marker. Measure the bag against your dog's body to determine the right size and cut it out. Use the scissors to cut the bag and the marker to mark the area where you will cut the bag.

gt_summary: Choose paper to start with.
pred_summary: Paper is a crucial element in creating a paper star. Any type of paper can be used, but sturdier options like printer paper are recommended first. The size of the paper can vary, but a square-sized or letter-sized paper (8.5” x 11”) is a good starting point.

gt_summary: Shift your car into reverse gear. Begin to back your car up. Turn your wheel sharply.
pred_summary: The method described in the text only works with cars that have a manual transmission and requires the use of the clutch, accelerator, and steering wheel. The process involves turning the steering wheel in one direction while shifting the car into reverse, then releasing the clutch and accelerator to cause the car to slide on the back wheels. The driver then jerks the steering wheel in the opposite direction to generate pressure against the body (lateral G force) and completes the donuts.

gt_summary: Purchase 1 1⁄4 pounds (570 g) of turkey breast for each person you'd like to serve.
pred_summary: Check the freezer case in the meat department if fresh turkey breasts are not available in the meat case. You should be able to find bone-in skin-on breasts all year round. This is a convenient option for those who want to cook a turkey at home without having to worry about finding fresh breasts.

gt_summary: Take pain relievers to address the pain. Apply dental wax to sharp edges. Place temporary dental fillings. Consult with your dentist.
pred_summary: Pain is sometimes experienced with tooth cavities, and over-the-counter pain relievers can be taken as needed. A temporary solution to sharp edges of tooth cavities is to apply dental wax, and a temporary filling material is available at pharmacies for those who cannot visit their dentist. It is important to consult a dentist for a permanent filling even if temporary solutions are used to deal with tooth cavities.

gt_summary: Search for an bingo card generator. Determine the type of information you want to place in each bingo square. Type in the name of your card and the words you will use. Decide whether or not you want a free space. Determine the size of your card. Print your bingo cards.
pred_summary: The text describes how to use online bingo card generators to create custom bingo cards for various games. The generators typically ask for the card title, list of words or numbers, and the number of squares on the card. After generating the cards, the user can print them out on card stock and laminate them for durability.

gt_summary: Deal yourself the top card by “second dealing” to the rest of the table. Deal your hand off the bottom of the deck. Stack the deck with the cards in order.
pred_summary: The author of the text describes a technique for dealing cards in Poker without revealing the order of the deck. The method involves sliding the top card of the deck at an angle and using the thumb and forefinger of the dealing hand to grab the next card, while keeping the rest of the deck hidden from view. The author also suggests using an overhand shuffle to float the desired cards to the top of the deck and then table shuffling to mix up the cards, making it more difficult for other players to guess the order of the deck.

gt_summary: Replace the keyed washer. Replace the torsion spring. Replace the top washer. Slide the top clip into place. Push in the turn post. Tighten the bolt with an Allen wrench. Place your fixed lever or knob back on the door.
pred_summary: The Emtek torsion spring needs to be put back in place and secured with an Allen wrench. Once the spring is secure, the lever or knob can be put back on the door. If the lever is stiff, it can be placed back on the door and if it doesn't fix the issue, it's best to contact Emtek for further assistance.

gt_summary: Decide if you want a default download folder. Decide if you want to select where each download gets saved. Exit the Downloads Settings menu.
pred_summary: The settings for downloading files are where you choose where your downloaded files are saved to. You can choose to save them to a default folder or pick where each individual download goes. If you want to pick where each download goes, you can check the box at the bottom of the settings menu.

gt_summary: Get a number of sheets of paper you can flip through. Create the individual images. Assemble the images together. Flip through the pages.
pred_summary: Flipbooks are a fun way to create the illusion of motion by flipping through pages of drawings or photographs. To make a flipbook, you can use sheets of paper bound at one edge, and draw or photograph the images you want to animate. Once you have your images arranged, bend the pages upward with your thumb and release them at an even speed to see the animation come to life.

gt_summary: Avoid making your boss too dependent on your work. Take care of your boss’s ego. Resist over-specializing in your current position. Share the load and let others do some of the work. Be willing to accept constructive feedback and criticism. Accept that some jobs are not meant for gifted people.
pred_summary: Highly intelligent people have challenges in the workplace, such as being seen as a workhorse, not being promoted, or feeling like they have to constantly prove themselves. They may also struggle with perfectionism and difficulty delegating tasks to others. Despite these challenges, highly intelligent people can still find ways to excel and be successful in their careers by learning to balance their strengths with their weaknesses and being open to feedback and criticism.

gt_summary: Open Google Maps. Click ☰. Click Add a missing place. Enter a name for the place. Add the place's address. Select a category. Add other information about your place. Click Submit.
pred_summary: Adding a place to Google Maps involves going to the Google Maps website, clicking the "Add a place" link in the pop-out menu, and entering the name, address, and category of the place you want to add. If the place you entered doesn't already exist in Google Maps, you'll receive a confirmation email within a couple of weeks. If the place already exists, you can click the "SUBMIT ANYWAY" button to update its address.

gt_summary: Flick the left analog stick forward twice. Hold forward to keep sprinting. Keep your hunger above six.
pred_summary: Sprinting in Minecraft is done by pushing the forward button on the control stick twice quickly, and then keeping the stick forward. This will cause your character to sprint until you release the stick, collide with a block, or interact with a mob. If your hunger level drops below six, you will no longer be able to sprint.
